table_description: GitHub Pull requests let you tell others about changes you've pushed to a branch in a repository on GitHub. Once a pull request is opened, you can discuss and review the potential changes with collaborators and add follow-up commits before your changes are merged into the base branch.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository the pull request belongs to.

columns.name: number
columns.description: The number of the pull request.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the pull request.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node ID of the pull request.

columns.name: active_lock_reason
columns.description: Reason that the conversation was locked.

columns.name: additions
columns.description: The number of additions in this pull request.

columns.name: author
columns.description: The author of the pull request.

columns.name: author_association
columns.description: Author's association with the pull request.

columns.name: base_ref_name
columns.description: Identifies the name of the base Ref associated with the pull request, even if the ref has been deleted.

columns.name: body
columns.description: The body as Markdown.

columns.name: changed_files
columns.description: The number of files changed in this pull request.

columns.name: checks_url
columns.description: URL for the checks of this pull request.

columns.name: closed
columns.description: If true, pull request is closed.

columns.name: closed_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the pull request was closed.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the pull request was created.

columns.name: created_via_email
columns.description: If true, pull request comment was created via email.

columns.name: deletions
columns.description: The number of deletions in this pull request.

columns.name: editor
columns.description: The actor who edited the pull request's body.

columns.name: head_ref_name
columns.description: Identifies the name of the head Ref associated with the pull request, even if the ref has been deleted.

columns.name: head_ref_oid
columns.description: Identifies the oid/sha of the head ref associated with the pull request, even if the ref has been deleted.

columns.name: includes_created_edit
columns.description: If true, this pull request was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.

columns.name: is_cross_repository
columns.description: If true, head and base repositories are different.

columns.name: is_draft
columns.description: If true, the pull request is a draft.

columns.name: is_read_by_user
columns.description: If true, this pull request was read by the current user.

columns.name: last_edited_at
columns.description: Timestamp the editor made the last edit.

columns.name: locked
columns.description: If true, the pull request is locked.

columns.name: maintainer_can_modify
columns.description: If true, maintainers can modify the pull request.

columns.name: mergeable
columns.description: Whether or not the pull request can be merged based on the existence of merge conflicts.

columns.name: merged
columns.description: If true, the pull request was merged.

columns.name: merged_at
columns.description: Timestamp when pull request was merged.

columns.name: merged_by
columns.description: The actor who merged the pull request.

columns.name: milestone
columns.description: The milestone associated with the pull request.

columns.name: permalink
columns.description: Permanent URL for the pull request.

columns.name: published_at
columns.description: Timestamp the pull request was published.

columns.name: revert_url
columns.description: URL to revert the pull request.

columns.name: review_decision
columns.description: The current status of this pull request with respect to code review.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the pull request.

columns.name: title
columns.description: The title of the pull request.

columns.name: total_comments_count
columns.description: The number of comments on the pull request.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the pull request was last updated.

columns.name: url
columns.description: URL of the pull request.

columns.name: assignees
columns.description: A list of Users assigned to the pull request.
